profile.name: Lazar Manasijevic
profile.summary: Backend architecture, cloud-native systems, and technical leadership for high-impact teams
profile.tagline: Building scalable systems and leading engineering teams to deliver reliable, production-grade software

experience.title: Technical Lead
responsibilities: Designs and overhauls development processes and standards; educates team for consistency
Troubleshoots complex issues requiring deep analysis; applies sound judgment in technical decisions
Assists with project planning and execution to ensure timeline and scope adherence
Responsible for engineer performance, professional development, and merit-based promotion proposals
Ensures release processes are well-defined and consistently followed

experience.title: Tech Lead / Engineering Manager
responsibilities: Delivered complex projects for clients in Sweden, Canada, Switzerland, and the USA
Acted as full-stack lead, focusing on high-quality backend architecture and adaptable frontends
Designed sophisticated relational and non-relational databases for efficient data management
Adopted modular development approaches to ensure future scalability
Oversaw KPI analysis to align technical execution with business objectives

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led integration of online casino games (slots, roulette, poker) for global markets
Co-created an in-house streaming solution for virtual/live roulette games
Directed creation of Backoffice Management Service using a custom framework
Managed development of the Casino Management System and Multi-game platform

projects.title: Florence Healthcare Platform
projects.context: Healthcare platform for clinical trial workflows
projects.problem: Internal platform needed scalable, secure services for diverse healthcare workflows
projects.approach: Led platform team, architected modular backend, implemented robust auth and data protection, drove best practices
projects.result: Delivered multiple high-impact projects, improved development velocity, enhanced security and reliability

projects.title: SyncPage CRM
projects.problem: Needed a flexible CRM for varied customer needs
projects.approach: Designed architecture from scratch, led full-stack development, set up infrastructure and CI/CD
projects.result: Launched scalable CRM, streamlined client onboarding, enabled rapid feature delivery

projects.title: Leviant Medical Devices Management
projects.problem: Hospitals required granular management of air purifying devices
projects.approach: Developed backend platform, integrated hardware data, ensured secure, reliable device management
projects.result: Enabled seamless hospital-device workflows, improved data accuracy and operational efficiency

projects.title: Botello Real Estate Platform
projects.context: Property management platform for Swedish landlords
projects.problem: Swedish landlords needed a compliant, integrated management platform
projects.approach: Built full-stack solution, integrated banking and legal systems, optimized for reliability
projects.result: Supported thousands of users, ensured regulatory compliance, improved landlord-tenant interactions

projects.title: Lepaya Learning Platform
projects.problem: Large-scale learning platform required robust client/server and DevOps
projects.approach: Developed features across stack, automated deployments, optimized performance
projects.result: Supported high user growth, improved uptime, streamlined development workflows

projects.title: Fazi Casino Games & Engine
projects.context: Online casino games and streaming platform
projects.problem: Needed interactive slot games and scalable game engines for global markets
projects.approach: Built bonus games, developed multiple engine versions, created in-house streaming and management apps
projects.result: Launched games in multiple markets, improved game performance, enabled real-time analytics

education.school: Faculty of Electronic Engineering, University of Niš

approach: Lead through clear communication and collaborative problem-solving
Balance hands-on technical work with strategic planning and mentorship
Foster a culture of learning and continuous improvement
codeQuality: Enforce consistent code standards through thorough reviews and documentation
Prioritize maintainability, readability, and testing in all deliverables
Encourage refactoring and technical debt management
communication: Participate actively in Agile ceremonies and ensure team alignment
Translate technical complexity into clear business value
Maintain transparent processes for releases and project tracking

footer.openTo: Open to remote/hybrid Technical Lead roles, architecture positions, and consulting opportunities
